description: Application for non-material amendment to planning permission ref: PA/15/01134 dated 12/07/2015Non Material Amendment (s) Sought: Addition of Basement bicycle storage smoke extract vent on Sidney Street elevation - Addition of Ground floor bicycle storage smoke extract vent on Sidney Street elevation - Addition of fire brigade dry riser cabinet on Sidney Street elevation - Addition of bathroom ventilation extract vent on North elevation - Addition of Kitchen extract vents on North and South elevations - Addition of heat pump extracts on North elevation - Addition of solar PV panels on 1st floor roof, 4th floor roof and 5th floor roof - Addition of maintenance access ladders to serve 1st floor and 5th floor roof - Grey Timber effect Cedral Click cladding changed to grey smooth effect Cedral Click cladding - Platinum White brick work at parapet level replaced with cast stone parapet capping - Amendments to brickwork bonding and patterning
